format: A data frame containing 872 observations on 7 variables.

parameters.foreign: Factor. Is the individual a foreigner (i.e., not Swiss)?
parameters.participation: Factor. Did the individual participate in the labor force?
parameters.youngkids: Number of young children (under 7 years of age).
parameters.oldkids: Number of older children (over 7 years of age).

reference: Journal of Applied Econometrics Data Archive.
title: Swiss Labor Market Participation Data
description:
Description
Cross-section data originating from the health survey SOMIPOPS
for Switzerland in 1981.
